title: Memo...Melbourne...Australia
creator_credit: Bilcock and Copping Film Productions and Victorian Film Corporation
brief_description: A brief, non-narrated look at Melbourne, using facts and statistics to give an outline of industry and manufacture, transport, energy resources, people and government. Commissioned by the Victorian Film Corporation on behalf of State Development.
